H0.text: The state of a plant grown in the dark with yellow leaves and long thin stems is known as what. Chlorotic

H1.text: The state of a plant grown in the dark with yellow leaves and long thin stems is known as what. Hypotrophic

H2.text: The state of a plant grown in the dark with yellow leaves and long thin stems is known as what. Albino

H3.text: The state of a plant grown in the dark with yellow leaves and long thin stems is known as what. Etiolate

A4.text: Etiolation is a characteristic of flowering plants grown in partial or complete absence of light.

A5.text: The pale color results from a lack of chlorophyll.
